attributes.action: to make job agency's illegal and let honest people find work their own way
attributes.additional_details: should we let agency's control our wages let them take our jobs and leave us with nothing but stress and out of pocket? I'm writing a petition to end all job agency's so we can go back to writing c/v's and get it sent directly to the employer know what hours we work get a proper wage without somebody in the head office tampering with it. i've been out of work for almost 2 years and have found it very difficult to apply for a job without an agency being involved. I know im not the only one who realises this so please sign my petition.
attributes.background: Put a ban on job agency's all together to make finding work easy without hassle.
